item.description:
Was you New Years resolution to get more involved in your community?

Do you want to meet new and interesting people? Do you believe in better?

 

This is the perfect event for you if you want to meet new people and/or get more involved.

Join the Boston Volunteers community with our fight for better.

 

We are actively seeking a few adept people to fight with us.

Can you help...

1. with organizing volunteer events in your community

2. us with outreach

3. filming a kickstarter campaign.

4. An talented writer and publicist.

 

 

Imagine: Sip some of my favorite hot chocolate in Boston

Imagine: Be help accountable for your New Years resolution

Imagine: Meeting new and interesting people who share your values.

 

We want to create a couple of jobs this year. We want to help even more people.

Can you help?

We anticipate volunteering with you, :)
Josh, Nagina, Corey, Sehily, Steph, Rick, Imanuela, Doreen, TeLisa and Nicole

The Boston Volunteers
Big enough to deliver, small enough to care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

P.S. Learn more about your fellow Boston Volunteers: 
https://www.facebook.com/BostonVolunteers
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the popular group standing next to the door. I'll provide my cell for your convenience.

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Sip hot chocolate and Get Involved Community
